Sentencas: This study seeks to clarify the effects of off-stoichiometry on the electrical conductivity of spinels in the (Ni,Fe)(3)O(4)and (Mn,Co)(3)O(4)systems.
Titulo: Effect of Off-Stoichiometry on Electrical Conductivity in Ni-Fe and Mn-Co Spinel Systems

Sentencas: Spinels with the compositions NixFe3-xO4(where x = 0.85, 0.875, 0.9, 1.0, 1.05, and 1.15) and MnxCo3-xO4(where x = 1.0, 1.2, 1.35, 1.5, 1.75, and 2.0) were prepared using conventional solid-state process.
Titulo: Effect of Off-Stoichiometry on Electrical Conductivity in Ni-Fe and Mn-Co Spinel Systems

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity measurements were taken between 500 degrees C and 800 degrees C using the 4-point DC method.
Titulo: Effect of Off-Stoichiometry on Electrical Conductivity in Ni-Fe and Mn-Co Spinel Systems

Sentencas: The conductivity in Ni-Fe spinels increased with increasing Fe content.
Titulo: Effect of Off-Stoichiometry on Electrical Conductivity in Ni-Fe and Mn-Co Spinel Systems

Sentencas: Similarly, the conductivity of Mn-Co spinels increased drastically with increasing Co content.
Titulo: Effect of Off-Stoichiometry on Electrical Conductivity in Ni-Fe and Mn-Co Spinel Systems

Sentencas: The coefficients of thermal expansion (CTEs) of these samples were also evaluated.
Titulo: Effect of Off-Stoichiometry on Electrical Conductivity in Ni-Fe and Mn-Co Spinel Systems

Sentencas: All the (Ni,Fe)(3)O(4)spinels were found to exhibit excellent CTE matching with prospective stack components.
Titulo: Effect of Off-Stoichiometry on Electrical Conductivity in Ni-Fe and Mn-Co Spinel Systems

Sentencas: However, thermal expansion characteristics were highly dependent on the composition in the (Mn,Co)(3)O(4)system, and only a narrow range of compositions was well-matched in CTE with prospective stack components.
Titulo: Effect of Off-Stoichiometry on Electrical Conductivity in Ni-Fe and Mn-Co Spinel Systems

Sentencas: The significant effect of cation off-stoichiometry and sample preparation on the electrical behavior of spinels was discussed as a possible explanation for the large discrepancies in reported conductivity values for both systems.
Titulo: Effect of Off-Stoichiometry on Electrical Conductivity in Ni-Fe and Mn-Co Spinel Systems
